attributes.title: Terrible app😡😡
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to try to support an orange fascist. Then the app made my phone shut off for 3 days had to take phone to the Apple store to get it fixed, whatever you do don’t download costed me so much money.

attributes.title: Disappointed...
attributes.review: This app is not as I was hoping. Very disappointed. I thought it would have quality articles about the events happening, but it did not. One star.

attributes.title: god bless the usa!! but not this app!!
attributes.review:
i really thought i could get some good info about MY president but all i got was some FAKE NEWS 🤧😤. I was telling my grandkids how much i loved donald trump and they suggest this app but -No More-!! I might vote for joe biden just because of this app alone 😳. 

bye 👋

attributes.title: horrible app
attributes.review: this app glitches so much. I cannot POSSIBLY do anything with it. You think trump would care about his his app and the PEOPLE using it. BUT NO. Trump does not care at all about the people. Shame on you Trump. worst app ever 👎🏼 clearly the worst person ever 🤮

attributes.title: Worst app I’ve ever had.
attributes.review: I’ve never had such a glitchy app before. Nothing was working, and every time I tried pressing a button nothing happened. Not only that, but Trump is the worst president in U.S. history. :)

attributes.title: It’s horrible
attributes.review: When I downloaded it it was very glitchy and after I used it once it wouldn’t let me after, I tried re-downloading but got the same results. Horrible app!

attributes.title: I HATE THIS APP!!!!!!!!!!!
attributes.review: Worst app ever made in life!!! I downloaded this app to get reasons to vote for Donald Trump, but nope not again. When I got in the app my phone shut down and some of my favorite pictures got deleted!!!!!! Never again will I have such an absurd idea to vote for Trump!!!!!!!!!

attributes.title: Disgusting
attributes.review: This is a horrible app do not recommend hacked my phone took all my information 😔 Nd now I have gotten everything back after I delete the app it takes up so much storage do NOT GET

attributes.title: This is the worst app ever
attributes.review: I don’t even know how this app is so bad when he is so red she should have some really great developers. Use some more of your money that you get from people and corporations to make a better app. Good luck!

attributes.title: Ticktock
attributes.review: I hope you know that your only at two stars because you are trying to close down tick tock so if you want the reviews to go up I would not delete it😡 but I do think you are a good president.
